remarks: A function is a non-unital ring homomorphism iff it preserves both addition and multiplication.  (Contributed by AV, 27-Feb-2020.)
statement:
isrnghmmul.m $e |- M = ( mulGrp ` R ) $.
isrnghmmul.n $e |- N = ( mulGrp ` S ) $.
isrnghmmul $p |- ( F e. ( R RngHomo S ) <-> ( ( R e. Rng /\ S e. Rng ) /\ ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F e. ( M MgmHom N ) ) ) ) $.
